thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: Jessica Moreno

author: Jessica Moreno
title: Jessica Moreno
text:
This was first time doing something like this (Clear and brilliant), so I was very scared especially because my skin is Uber sensitive.
My skin issues due to high stress, over exfoliation, lack of sun protection and NO knowledge on how to properly cleanse throughout my whole life.
So, premature aging signs, skin dull and dead looking, monstrous pores, tiny breakouts near mouth and jawline, and deep tear trough lines under eyes making me look tired all the time.
The process is a little weird and uncomfortable at first (slathering numbing cream like icing, the burn from the laser after the numbing goes down).
Then of course, for about an hour or 2 the afterburn wasn't horrible but definitely that *I didn't wear sunblock and my face just got burnt from the sun* kind of burn.
The great news is, it didn't last, the burning goes away pretty quick. The next morning (today) I already see a noticeable difference.
The tear trough stress impressions lightened a little, aren't as long or deep anymore. My complexion is a bit more one-tone and even though as the nurses notified me I would have rough skin, it's still smoother. Not to mention, my pores have gotten SO MUCH smaller!! Or less noticeable without having to use makeup?
And this is just from the first treatment. I can't wait to see what the finish product will be after the next 2!
